comment:
Parses & constructs URLs.
##
## **Note**: This module will be deprecated in the future and merged into a
## new ``url`` module.

name: Url
description: represents a Uniform Resource Locator (URL) any optional component is "" if it does not exist
code: Url* = tuple[scheme, username, password, hostname, port, path, query, anchor: string]

description: turns the URL <cite>u</cite> into its string representation.
